title: Gorakhpur Deaths: Adityanath Government Ignored SOS on Oxygen Payments for Months
selftext: Just a reminder now that Jawan movie is running in theatres.
comments: Oxygen is a western concept and I’m not paying for it ~ Yogi may be
Also stop breathing it, it is a western concept.
*itni hava hai, le to le bawde* - Lala ramdev
The only thing good about Yogi is that should Vin Diesel die,  he can replace him in Fast 11. Other than that, this guy is the epitome of evil.

We should replace Bhogi Adityanath with Vin Diesel
